title: BLES01739-[Dead Island Riptide][PS3]
description:
Game            Dead Island:Riptide
Developer(s)	Techland
Publisher(s)	Deep Silver
Engine	        Chrome Engine 5
Released	NA April 23, 2013
                AU April 23, 2013
                EU April 26, 2013 (Global)                  
Genre	        Action role-playing, survival horror 
Mode(s)	        Single-player, multiplayer
CONSOLE         PS3
GAME REGION     BLES01739 (EUR)
---------------------------------------------------
This Backup Game is Copied & Uploaded By  MaSsUp . 
The Game is tested On Rogero 4.50 v1.0 .
---------------------------------------------------
How To Install : 

1. Copy The File ( BLES01739-[Dead Island Riptide] ) into USB Drive (Fat32) .
2. Connect The USB Drive to the "PS3" and Launch "Multiman".
3. Open "File manager /mmOS" or just press "Start+Select" at the same time.
4. Copy (BLES01739-[Dead Island Riptide]) from : "PS3 Root = dev_usb000" .
5. Paste the copied folder into this Location : "PS3 Root = dev_hdd0 = Games" .
---------------------------------------------------
Note : this Game requires "BD Mirror" setting to work .

To enable "BD Mirror" Setting : 
1. Launch "Multiman" .
2. Navigate to the game you want to enable "BD Mirror" then press "Square".
3. Under The "Game Cover" Navigate to "BD Mirror" and Press "X" .
4. Launch the game and Enjoy.
